be placed before\njson_logging.init method call\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable\u003e\n\u003cthead\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003cth\u003eName\u003c/th\u003e\n\u003cth\u003eDescription\u003c/th\u003e\n\u003cth\u003eDefault value\u003c/th\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/thead\u003e\n\u003ctbody\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eENABLE_JSON_LOGGING\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003e**\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003e\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eDEPRECATED** Whether to enable JSON logging mode.Can be set as an environment variable, enable when set to to either one in following list (case-insensitive) \u003cstrong\u003e['true', '1', 'y', 'yes']\u003c/strong\u003e , this have no effect on request logger\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003efalse\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003e\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eCORRELATION_ID_FIELD\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eName of field in generated log messages containing the correlation-id value\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003e'correlation_id'\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eCORRELATION_ID_HEADERS\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eList of HTTP headers that will be used to look for correlation-id value. HTTP headers will be searched one by one according to list order\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003e['X-Correlation-ID','X-Request-ID']\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eEMPTY_VALUE\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eDefault value when a logging record property is None\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003e'-'\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eCORRELATION_ID_GENERATOR\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003efunction to generate unique correlation-id\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003euuid.uuid1\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eJSON_SERIALIZER\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003efunction to encode object to JSON\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003ejson.dumps\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eCOMPONENT_ID\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eUniquely identifies the software component that has processed the current request\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eEMPTY_VALUE\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eCOMPONENT_NAME\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eA human-friendly name representing the software component\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eEMPTY_VALUE\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eCOMPONENT_INSTANCE_INDEX\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eInstance's index of horizontally scaled service\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003e0\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eCREATE_CORRELATION_ID_IF_NOT_EXISTS\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eWhether to generate a new correlation-id in case one is not present\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003ctd\u003eTrue\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/tbody\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"markdown-heading\" dir=\"auto\"\u003e\u003ch1 tabindex=\"-1\" class=\"heading-element\" dir=\"auto\"\u003e4. easily indexed and searchable by logging infrastructure suchas <a href="https://www.elastic.co/elk-stack" rel="nofollow">ELK</a>, <a href="https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-set-up-an-elasticsearch-fluentd-and-kibana-efk-logging-stack-on-kubernetes" rel="nofollow">EFK</a>, AWS Cloudwatch, GCP Stackdriver, etc.</p><p dir="auto">If you're using Cloud Foundry, it might worth to check out thelibrary <a href="https://github.com/SAP/cf-python-logging-support">SAP/cf-python-logging-support</a> which I'm also class="heading-element" dir="auto">1. Features</h1><a id="user-content-1-features" class="anchor-element" aria-label="Permalink: 1. Features" href="#1-features"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div><ol dir="auto"><li>Emit JSON logs (<a href="#0-full-logging-format-references">format detail</a>)</li><li>Lightweight, no dependencies, minimal configuration needed (1 LoC to get it working)</li><li>Seamlessly integrate with Python native <strong>logging</strong> module. Support both Python 2.7.x and 3.x</li><li>Auto extract <strong>correlation-id</strong> for distributed tracing <a href="#1-what-is-correlation-idrequest-id">[1]</a></li><li>Support HTTP request instrumentation. Built in support for <a href="https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/" rel="nofollow">FastAPI</a>, <a href="https://github.com/pallets/flask/">Flask</a>, <a href="https://github.com/channelcat/sanic">Sanic</a>, <a href="https://gitlab.com/pgjones/quart" rel="nofollow">Quart</a>, <a href="https://github.com/zalando/connexion">Connexion</a>. Extensible to supportother web frameworks. PR welcome 😃 .</li><li>Highly customizable: support inject arbitrary extra properties to JSON log message, override logging formatter, etc.</li><li>Production ready, has been used in production since 2017 with more than 8 millions downloads</li></ol><div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">2. Usage</h1><a id="user-content-2-usage" class="anchor-element" aria-label="Permalink: 2. To enable it on production set enable_json in <strong>json_logging.init_< framework_name >()</strong> method call.Once configured library will try to configure all loggers (existing and newly created) to emit log in JSON format. HTTP headers will be searched one by one according to list order</td><td>['X-Correlation-ID','X-Request-ID']</td></tr><tr><td>EMPTY_VALUE</td><td>Default value when a logging record property is None</td><td>'-'</td></tr><tr><td>CORRELATION_ID_GENERATOR</td><td>function to generate unique correlation-id</td><td>uuid.uuid1</td></tr><tr><td>JSON_SERIALIZER</td><td>function to encode object to JSON</td><td>json.dumps</td></tr><tr><td>COMPONENT_ID</td><td>Uniquely identifies the software component that has processed the current request</td><td>EMPTY_VALUE</td></tr><tr><td>COMPONENT_NAME</td><td>A human-friendly name representing the software component</td><td>EMPTY_VALUE</td></tr><tr><td>COMPONENT_INSTANCE_INDEX</td><td>Instance's index of horizontally scaled service</td><td>0</td></tr><tr><td>CREATE_CORRELATION_ID_IF_NOT_EXISTS</td><td>Whether to generate a new correlation-id in case one is not present</td><td>True</td></tr></tbody></table><div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">4. Python References</h1><a id="user-content-4-python-references" class="anchor-element" aria-label="Permalink: 4. d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 framework, you need to extend following classes in <a href="/bobbui/json-logging-python/blob/master/blob/master/json_logging/framework_base.py">**framework_base**</a> and register support using <a href="https://github.com/thangbn/json-logging-python/blob/master/json_logging/__init__.py#L38">**json_logging.register_framework_support**</a>method:</p><table><thead><tr><th>Class</th><th>Description</th><th>Mandatory</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>BaseRequestInfoExtractor</td><td>Helper class help to extract logging-relevant information from HTTP request object</td><td>yes</td></tr><tr><td>BaseResponseInfoExtractor</td><td>Helper class help to extract logging-relevant information from HTTP response object</td><td>yes</td></tr><tr><td>BaseFrameworkConfigurator</td><td>Class to perform logging configuration for given framework as needed</td><td>no</td></tr><tr><td>BaseAppRequestInstrumentationConfigurator</td><td>Class to perform request instrumentation logging configuration</td><td>no</td></tr></tbody></table><p dir="auto">Take a look at <a href="/bobbui/json-logging-python/blob/master/json_logging/framework_base.py"><strong>json_logging/base_framework.py</strong></a>, <a href="/bobbui/json-logging-python/blob/master/json_logging/framework/flask">**json_logging.flask**</a> and <a href="/bobbui/json-logging-python/blob/master/json_logging/framework/sanic"><strong>json_logging.sanic</strong></a> packagesfor reference implementations.</p><div class="markdown-heading"
